attributes.action: appear before the Iraq Inquiry to make his statement before the next General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is important that the people of the UK understand the full truth about Gordon Brown's involvement in the decision to go to war *before* they are asked to vote on who should be the next Prime Minister.

Delaying his appearance until after the General Election denies the electorate important information which they have a right to have in order for them to make an informed decision on polling day.

rejection.details: The inquiry committee decides who to call to give evidence and when that takes place. For more information visit http://www.iraqinquiry.org.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
